## COMPANY INFORMATION

Company Name: Audit Firms Dubai
Legal Entity: Part of Farahat & Co. Network
Type: Professional Audit & Assurance Services Firm
Founded: 1985
Location: Business Bay, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
Operating Since: 37 years (1985-2024)
Website: https://auditfirmsdubai.ae
Email: info@auditfirmsdubai.ae
Phone: +971 4 250 0251
WhatsApp: +971 52 6922 588
Office Hours: Sunday-Thursday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM GST (UTC+4)

## ABOUT US

Audit Firms Dubai is a leading professional audit and assurance services provider in the United Arab Emirates, established in 1985 as part of the Farahat & Co. network. With 37 years of experience serving over 28,000 clients across 140 countries, we are Ministry of Economy approved auditors specializing in helping Dubai and UAE businesses achieve regulatory compliance and financial excellence.

Our team of 150+ certified professionals (CPAs, CAs, ACCAs) delivers comprehensive audit solutions with a unique 7-day express service - the fastest turnaround in Dubai's audit industry. We serve businesses across all 45+ UAE free zones and mainland territories.

## CORE SERVICES

### Audit Services
- External Audit (Statutory Compliance)
- Internal Audit & Risk Assessment
- Forensic Audit & Fraud Investigation
- Due Diligence for M&A
- RERA Audit for Real Estate
- Special Purpose Audits
- Group Consolidation Audits

### Tax & Advisory Services
- VAT Registration & Compliance
- Corporate Tax Advisory (New UAE Tax)
- Transfer Pricing Documentation
- International Tax Planning
- Tax Dispute Resolution

### Compliance Services
- IFRS Implementation & Conversion
- Economic Substance Regulations (ESR)
- Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Compliance
- Ministry of Economy Compliance
- Free Zone Regulatory Compliance

### Business Advisory
- Business Valuation Services
- Financial Reporting Advisory
- Management Consulting
- Corporate Finance Advisory
- Risk Management Consulting

## PRICING INFORMATION

- Small Business Audit: AED 15,000 - 25,000
- Medium Enterprise Audit: AED 25,000 - 50,000
- Large Corporation Audit: AED 50,000 - 100,000
- Enterprise/Group Audit: AED 100,000+

- Internal Audit: AED 20,000 - 40,000
- Due Diligence: Project-based pricing

Note: All prices are indicative. Final pricing depends on company size, complexity, and specific requirements.

## FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

**Q: How fast can you complete an audit?**
A: We offer a 7-day express audit service, the fastest in Dubai. For urgent cases, we can complete audits in as little as 72 hours.

**Q: Are you Ministry approved?**
A: Yes, we are fully licensed and approved by the UAE Ministry of Economy, as well as all major regulatory bodies including DFSA and SCA.

**Q: Which free zones do you cover?**
A: We are authorized auditors for all 45+ UAE free zones including DIFC, DMCC, DAFZA, JAFZA, Dubai South, and all others.

**Q: What is your pricing?**
A: We offer fixed, transparent pricing starting from AED 15,000 for small business audits. Get an instant quote at our website.

**Q: Do you handle corporate tax?**
A: Yes, we provide comprehensive corporate tax services including registration, compliance, and advisory for the new UAE corporate tax regime.
